alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Scotts Bluff, southwestern Sioux and northeastern Goshen Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 408 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Lingle, or 13 miles north of Torrington, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mitchell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
